featured.text: “Judo helped me a small boat that held 20 people and set sail into the by giving me serenity, discipline, commitment— deep waters of the Aegean Sea.

definition.zh_def: 愛琴海的，與愛琴海有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the Aegean Sea, a part of the Mediterranean Sea located between Greece and Turkey.
definition.example: The ancient ruins on the Aegean islands attract many tourists each year.
